overview: History of an impersonator at a gay gay bar. Lito (Andrew Schimmer) inherits the job of his father (Simon Ibarra) who becomes an impersonator at a gay bar owned by Mang Tano (Chris Dalus). Lito's father and Mang Tano are related and Lito is considered to be Mang Tano's own son so his mother (Dexter Doria) is angry with him. Whatever job Lito enters is only profitable. Her best friend Lorna (Mon Confiado) is her booking agent or manager looking for a racket for her. Their lives changed when a porn project Lorna received for Lito arrived. Project X: Pinoy Deep Throat captures the title of the video scandal that Lito will make Where his fellow men can have sex. What impact will such a project have on their lives? Directed by Cesar Aquino and Miko Jacinto.
title: Project X
